Description
io.fluxcapacitor.common.api.tracking
 
io.fluxcapacitor.common.tracking
 
  • Classes in io.fluxcapacitor.common.api.tracking used by io.fluxcapacitor.common.api.tracking
    Class
    Description
    MessageBatch.Metric
    Compact summary of a MessageBatch, used for logging and performance tracking.
    Position
    Represents the tracking state of a consumer, i.e. the last known indexes of consumed messages per segment.
    Read
    Command to read a batch of messages from the Flux platform for a given consumer and tracker.
    ReadFromIndexResult.Metric
    Metric representation of a ReadFromIndexResult, used for internal monitoring and analytics.
    ReadResult.Metric
    Compact representation of the ReadResult used for monitoring.
  • Classes in io.fluxcapacitor.common.api.tracking used by io.fluxcapacitor.common.tracking
    Class
    Description
    MessageBatch
    Represents a batch of messages retrieved from the message store for a specific segment range.
    Position
    Represents the tracking state of a consumer, i.e. the last known indexes of consumed messages per segment.
    Read
    Command to read a batch of messages from the Flux platform for a given consumer and tracker.
